name: React Portfolio
description: A webpage for my Portfolio using React, which contains projects, about me and skills and also links to Linkedin and Github.

name: React Weather App
description: A web application to show weather conditions for any city by fetching data from OpenWeather API and React for the UI.

name: Weather App
description: A web application to show weather conditions according to the geolocation of the user, using OpenWeather API and HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS for the UI.

name: MERN Shopping List
description: A web application to add, update, read and delete items from a list, using React for frontend, Node/Express for the bakcend and MongoDB as database.

name: React Task Tracker
description: A web application to track the list of your tasks using React.
